name: Slateofchina Stone Company
tag_list: roofing-slate, paving-slate-paving, flooring-slate, billiard-slate, cultural-stone, culture-slate, slate-planter-pot, slate-flower-pot, slate-roofing, slate-tile, natural-slate, walling-slate, slate-floor-slate, mushroom-slate, roofing-tiles, flagstone, p
overview:
Slateofchina Stone Company is a leading Chinese slate quarry owner and slate supplier. Slateofchina Ltd mainely produces roofing slate, flooring slate, paving slate, wall cladding slate,culture slate,mushroom slate, random slate, billiard slate, Slate dish,slate plate,slate tray,placemat,slate board,slate coaster,slate cheese board etc from our own Chinese slate quarry. Our slate conform to BS680(1971) and EN12326 standards.Based on the rich natural resources, we have succeeded in supplying a wide range of top quality slates and relevant stone products for our customers around the world in great quantity every year at most competitive prices.

We expect to establish long-term cooperation with you in future.

For the further information,please visit our website: http://www.slateofchina.com Email: sinoslate@gmail.com

Add: Xiong Village,HengTang Town, XingZi County, JiuJiang City, JiangXi, China contact: Mr.Xiong Tel: +86 792 269 0031
